medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports developing pain for the last 3 days in the RUQ. Pain is sharp, constant, relieved with Ibuprofen. No association with food. No fevers or chills. + Nausea, no emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of desmoid tumor s/p multiple abdominal surgeries, FAP, hernia, colostomy reversal.
